com.netflix.governator.internal

Class AbstractLifecycleFeature

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.governator.internal.AbstractLifecycleFeature
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LifecycleFeature
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PostConstructLifecycleActions, PreDestroyLifecycleActions

    abstract class AbstractLifecycleFeature
extends java.lang.Object
implements LifecycleFeature
    Base utility class for field and method based lifecycle features. This class deals with identifying all the fields and methods for the type and its superclasses and interfaces and delegating the actual processing using the template methods getFieldAction and getMethodAction.
    Author:
    elandau

      • getActionsForType

        public java.util.List<LifecycleAction> getActionsForType(java.lang.Class<?> type)
        Description copied from interface: LifecycleFeature
        Return a list of actions to perform on object of this type as part of lifecycle processing. Each LifecycleAction will likely be tied to processing of a specific field or method.
        Specified by:
        getActionsForType in interface LifecycleFeature
        Returns:
